Open Dataset

Source: R/wid_open.R
wid_open.Rd

Open the Work in Data dataset.

Usage

wid_open(location = "work-in-data", ...,
  key = Sys.getenv("AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID"),
  secret = Sys.getenv("AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY"))

Arguments

location

Local or remote path to the dataset.

...

Passes additional arguments to s3_bucket.

key

Your AWS access key; defaults to the AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID environment variable.

secret

Your AWS secret key; defaults to the AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY environment variable.

Value

The Work in Data Dataset.

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{

  wid_open("/nfs/roberts/pi/dissc/work-in-data/gender_growth_gap")
} # }
